title: Gatsby
description:
GatsbyJS is a React-based, GraphQL powered, static site generator.
What does that even mean? Well, it weaves together the best parts of react, webpack, react-router, GraphQL, and other front-end tools in to one very enjoyable developer experience. Don’t get hung up on the moniker ‘static site generator’. That term has been around for a while, but Gatsby is far more like a modern front-end framework than a static site generator of old.
